amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to strengthening the economy by accelerating the transfer of technologies from laboratories of the Department of Energy and the Department of Defense to the marketplace.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1013 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1013 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Heinrich. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2020) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to strengthening the economy by accelerating the transfer of technologies from laboratories of the Department of Energy and the Department of Defense to the marketplace.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1013 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Heinrich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1013 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
